name: chatgpt-right-click
description: Quickly apply ChatGPT prompts to selected text via right-click in the editor.

commands.title: ChatGPT Right Click: Run on Selection

chatgpt-right-click.openaiApiKey.name: chatgpt-right-click
chatgpt-right-click.openaiApiKey.markdownDescription: OpenAI API key. Stored by VS Code settings.

chatgpt-right-click.enableWebsearch.markdownDescription: Enable websearch for each prompt. If true, websearch will be used for every prompt unless disabled.

chatgpt-right-click.model.markdownDescription: OpenAI model for the Responses API.

chatgpt-right-click.prompts.markdownDescription: List of prompt templates. {selection} is replaced with the current selection.

model.markdownDescription: (Optional) Model to use for this prompt. Overrides the global model setting if specified.

enableWebsearch.markdownDescription: (Optional) Enable websearch for this prompt. If true, websearch will be used for this prompt regardless of the global setting. If false, disables websearch for this prompt. If not set, falls back to the global setting.

default.label: Fix grammar and spelling
default.template:
Fix the grammar and spelling of '{selection}'.
Preserve all formatting, line breaks, and special characters. Do not add or remove any content. Return only the corrected text.

default.label: Smooth the language
default.template:
Smooth this text: {selection} 
Return only the edited text without any comments. Do not remove footnotes from markdown.
